document.full_text: the vietnamese government said it had halted the nationwide vaccination of poultry against bird flu, saying a new type of the h5n1 virus had rendered the vaccine ineffective.
document.title: vietnam halts bird flu vaccination due to new type
lines_and_colors: the vietnamese government said it had halted the nationwide vaccination of poultry against bird flu, saying a new type of the h5n1 virus had rendered the vaccine ineffective.
